description: Mobile techniques used by X-Agent for Android, ATT&CK software S0314 v1.1
name: X-Agent for Android (S0314)

techniques.comment: [X-Agent for Android](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0314) was believed to have been used to obtain locational data of Ukrainian artillery forces.(Citation: CrowdStrike-Android)
[X-Agent for Android](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0314) was placed in a repackaged version of an application used by Ukrainian artillery forces.(Citation: CrowdStrike-Android)
